page.title: 14EDUCATION (LAMPHEY)
page.content: The area around Lamphey is served by one County Primary School in Lamphey itself.It is housed in a building erected in the early part of this century.Prior to that there was a small school near the church.At the age of eleven the children transfer to the very large comprehensive school in Pembroke.Some of the professional people in the area send their children to a private school in Saundersfoot and then to public school,a number of them going to Christs College in Brecon. The school also takes children from the Pembroke area. Further education is provided by a technical college in Haverfordwest but students have to travel much further afield for university or training college education.
